languages.text: Говорят, общение с чернью не проходит даром. Слухи о том, что Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус копошится в космическом мусоре, быстро расходятся по Простору.

traits.locale_text: Говорят, общение с чернью не проходит даром. Слухи о том, что Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус копошится в космическом мусоре, быстро расходятся по Коронусу.

languages.text: Associating with vermin always leaves its mark. Rumours that Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius is spending {mf|his|her} time playing with space rubbish are quickly spreading across the Expanse.
languages.original_text: Говорят, общение с чернью не проходит даром. Слухи о том, что Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус копошится в космическом мусоре, быстро расходятся по Простору.

traits.locale_text: Associating with vermin always leaves its mark. Rumours that Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius is spending {mf|his|her} time playing with space rubbish are quickly spreading across the Koronus.

Associating with vermin always leaves its mark. Rumours that Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius is spending {mf|his|her} time playing with space rubbish are quickly spreading across the Expanse.

languages.text: 与贱民打交道必然会留下痕迹。目前，关于行商浪人的传闻正在科罗努斯扩区快速蔓延，说{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯喜欢把时间花在太空垃圾上。
languages.original_text: Associating with vermin always leaves its mark. Rumours that Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius is spending {mf|his|her} time playing with space rubbish are quickly spreading across the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 与贱民打交道必然会留下痕迹。目前，关于行商浪人的传闻正在科罗努斯扩区快速蔓延，说{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯喜欢把时间花在太空垃圾上。

languages.text: 害虫と関わるとその痕跡は必ず残る。自由開拓者{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスが宇宙ごみで遊んで時間をつぶしているという噂が、エクスパンス中を瞬く間に駆け回った。
languages.original_text: Associating with vermin always leaves its mark. Rumours that Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius is spending {mf|his|her} time playing with space rubbish are quickly spreading across the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 害虫と関わるとその痕跡は必ず残る。自由開拓者{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスが宇宙ごみで遊んで時間をつぶしているという噂が、エクスパンス中を瞬く間に駆け回った。

languages.text: Asociarse con la chusma siempre deja huella. Los rumores que afirman que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius pasa el rato jugando con la basura espacial corren por la Extensión.
languages.original_text: Associating with vermin always leaves its mark. Rumours that Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius is spending {mf|his|her} time playing with space rubbish are quickly spreading across the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Asociarse con la chusma siempre deja huella. Los rumores que afirman que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius pasa el rato jugando con la basura espacial corren por la Extensión.

languages.text: Der Umgang mit Ungeziefer hinterlässt stets Spuren. Gerüchte, wonach {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius {mf|seine|ihre} Zeit mit Weltraummüll verbringt, verbreiten sich in der Ausdehnung wie ein Lauffeuer.
languages.original_text: Associating with vermin always leaves its mark. Rumours that Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius is spending {mf|his|her} time playing with space rubbish are quickly spreading across the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Der Umgang mit Ungeziefer hinterlässt stets Spuren. Gerüchte, wonach {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius {mf|seine|ihre} Zeit mit Weltraummüll verbringt, verbreiten sich in der Ausdehnung wie ein Lauffeuer.

languages.text: S'associer à des vermines laisse toujours des traces. Des rumeurs affirmant que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius côtoie volontiers les pires vauriens de l'espace se propagent rapidement à travers les Étendues.
languages.original_text: Associating with vermin always leaves its mark. Rumours that Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius is spending {mf|his|her} time playing with space rubbish are quickly spreading across the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: S'associer à des vermines laisse toujours des traces. Des rumeurs affirmant que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius côtoie volontiers les pires vauriens de l'espace se propagent rapidement à travers les Étendues.

languages.text: Haşerelerle haşır neşir olmak, kişinin üzerinde çeşitli etkiler bırakır. Hür Tacir {name} von Valancius'un, zamanını uzay çöpleriyle oynamaya harcadığına dair söylentiler Enginlik'te hızla yayılıyor.
languages.original_text: Associating with vermin always leaves its mark. Rumours that Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius is spending {mf|his|her} time playing with space rubbish are quickly spreading across the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Haşerelerle haşır neşir olmak, kişinin üzerinde çeşitli etkiler bırakır. Hür Tacir {name} von Valancius'un, zamanını uzay çöpleriyle oynamaya harcadığına dair söylentiler Enginlik'te hızla yayılıyor.
